mapper.select: select comm_board.*, rownum r from (select * from comm_board order by comm_group desc, comm_level) comm_board where pnum=#{pnum} and status='0'
select * from comm_board where comm_num=#{comm_num} and status='0'
select count(*) from comm_board where pnum=#{pnum} and status=0
mapper.update: update comm_board set status='1' where comm_num=#{comm_num}
update comm_board set comm_content = #{comm_content}, reg = sysdate where comm_num = #{comm_num}
